original_text: And Nabal answered David's servants, and said, Who is David? and who is the son of Jesse? there be many servants now a days that break away every man from his master.
korean_text: 나발이 다윗의 사환들에게 대답하여 이르되 다윗은 누구며 이새의 아들은 누구냐 요즈음에 각기 주인에게서 억지로 떠나는 종이 많도다

sentences.original_text: and who is the son of Jesse?
there be many servants now a days
that break away every man from his master.
